message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $150. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm looking to save some money.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $80 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $125. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $125 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you at $90. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
